infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Our app uses your photo library to let you update your profile photo. This makes your profile more personal and helps others recognize you.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app uses the camera to scan barcodes.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app uses your location to show relevant job offers near you and to enhance your experience by providing location-based services.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: This app uses your location to provide continuous location tracking for better service delivery, even when the app is in the background.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: This app needs your location to provide accurate and timely services, whether the app is in use or in the background.
